## Description {#details}

Implementation for an ilist node.

Templated on an appropriate <em><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/ilist-detail/node-options">ilist&#95;detail::node&#95;options</a></em>, usually computed by <em><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/ilist-detail/compute-node-options">ilist&#95;detail::compute&#95;node&#95;options</a></em>.

This is a wrapper around <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node-base">ilist&#95;node&#95;base</a></em> whose main purpose is to provide type safety: you can&#39;t insert nodes of <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node-impl">ilist&#95;node&#95;impl</a></em> into the wrong <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simple-ilist">simple&#95;ilist</a></em> or <em>iplist</em>.

Definition at line 72 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/ilist-node-h">ilist&#95;node.h</a>.

### isSentinel() {#a0570092282570244c4d7af86003f0aa9}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;class OptionsT&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>bool llvm::ilist&#95;node&#95;impl&lt; OptionsT &gt;::isSentinel () const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> whether this is the sentinel node.

This requires sentinel tracking to be explicitly enabled. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/ilist-sentinel-tracking">ilist&#95;sentinel&#95;tracking&lt;true&gt;</a> option to get this API.
